summary: When I played the Main Questline with a higher damage multiplier (same effect if you play on easy difficulties) I was surprised how fast Alduin was defeated. The fight wasn\'t really challenging and much too short. So with this small mod Alduin has 2, 4, 6, 8 or 10 times more base health points.
descriptionHtml:
When I played the Main Questline with a higher damage multiplier (same effect if you play on easy difficulties) I was surprised how fast Alduin was defeated. The fight wasn\'t really challenging and much too short. So with this small mod Alduin has 2, 4, 6, 8 or 10 times more base health points.
Download the .zip file and move the .esp you prefer to your data folder.
author: TheBugfix
